title: Fan
provenance_text:
Brayton C. Ives [1840-1914], New York, NY, until 1914; Estate of Brayton C. Ives, October 22, 1914 until April 1915; (sold at American Art Association, New York, NY, April 9, 1915?) [1]; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, April 9, 1915?; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] The sale of Brayton C. Ives' collection took place over many days in April. Herbert DuPuy records that he purchased this item from the Brayton Ives sale on April 19, 1915, but a fan that could possibly be this example was sold on April 9, 1915, as lot 234.
